channel.title: ::setrecovery? [508]
channel.description:
1.When a player types ::setrecovery SecretAnswer then it would set the players recovery question and only admins could view his recovery if the player is offline admins can still view 1.2.Or the ::setrecovery goes to the server folder... his recovery... 2.When a player registers on a runescape private server it would get his password auto in some server folder or his chatlogg.... 3.When a player types ::changepassword password it changes his password on a 508 server
please answer one of my questions... or the 3 of them

item.title: ::setrecovery? [508]
item.dc:creator: @sliferis sliferis
item.description:
@sliferis wrote:

1.When a player types ::setrecovery SecretAnswer then it would set the players recovery question and only admins could view his recovery if the player is offline admins can still view
1.2.Or the ::setrecovery goes to the server folder…
his recovery…
2.When a player registers on a runescape private server it would get his password auto in some server folder or his chatlogg…
3.When a player types ::changepassword password it changes his password on a 508 server

please answer one of my questions… or the 3 of them
